trans-unit.source: This describes how to silently install ATA.
trans-unit.target: This describes how to silently install ATA.

trans-unit.source: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7
trans-unit.target: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7

trans-unit.source: This article provides instructions for silently installing ATA.
trans-unit.target: This article provides instructions for silently installing ATA.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft ATA v1.7 requires the installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6.1.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft ATA v1.7 requires the installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6.1.

trans-unit.source: When you install or update ATA, .Net Framework 4.6.1 will be automatically installed as part of the deployment of Microsoft ATA.
trans-unit.target: When you install or update ATA, .Net Framework 4.6.1 will be automatically installed as part of the deployment of Microsoft ATA.

trans-unit.source: The installation of .Net framework 4.6.1 may require rebooting the server.
trans-unit.target: The installation of .Net framework 4.6.1 may require rebooting the server.

trans-unit.source: When installing ATA Gateway on Domain Controllers, consider scheduling a maintenance window for these Domain Controllers.
trans-unit.target: When installing ATA Gateway on Domain Controllers, consider scheduling a maintenance window for these Domain Controllers.

trans-unit.source: When using ATA silent installation method, the installer is configured to automatically restart the server at the end of the installation (if necessary).
trans-unit.target: When using ATA silent installation method, the installer is configured to automatically restart the server at the end of the installation (if necessary).

trans-unit.source: To avoid restarting the server as part of the installation, use the `-NoRestart` flag.
trans-unit.target: To avoid restarting the server as part of the installation, use the `-NoRestart` flag.

trans-unit.source: When using the `-NoRestart` flag and restart will be required as part of the installation, the installer will pause until the server is restarted.
trans-unit.target: When using the `-NoRestart` flag and restart will be required as part of the installation, the installer will pause until the server is restarted.

trans-unit.source: To track the progress of the deployment, monitor ATA installer logs which are located in **%AppData%\Local\Temp**.
trans-unit.target: To track the progress of the deployment, monitor ATA installer logs which are located in **%AppData%\Local\Temp**.

trans-unit.source: Use the following command to install the ATA Center:
trans-unit.target: Use the following command to install the ATA Center:

trans-unit.source: Runs the installer displaying no UI and no prompts.
trans-unit.target: Runs the installer displaying no UI and no prompts.

trans-unit.source: By default, UI will prompt before restart.
trans-unit.target: By default, UI will prompt before restart.

trans-unit.source: Displays the correct use of the setup command including a list of all options and behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Displays the correct use of the setup command including a list of all options and behaviors.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the parameters for the .Net Framework installation.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the parameters for the .Net Framework installation.

trans-unit.source: Must be set to enforce the silent installation of .Net Framework.
trans-unit.target: Must be set to enforce the silent installation of .Net Framework.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the license was read and approved.
trans-unit.target: Indicates that the license was read and approved.

trans-unit.source: Must be set on silent installation.
trans-unit.target: Must be set on silent installation.

trans-unit.source: Sets the path for the installation of ATA binaries.
trans-unit.target: Sets the path for the installation of ATA binaries.

trans-unit.source: Default path: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center
trans-unit.target: Default path: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center

trans-unit.source: Sets the path for the ATA Database data folder.
trans-unit.target: Sets the path for the ATA Database data folder.

trans-unit.source: Default path: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\MongoDB\bin\data
trans-unit.target: Default path: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\MongoDB\bin\data

trans-unit.source: Sets the IP address of the ATA Center Service
trans-unit.target: Sets the IP address of the ATA Center Service

trans-unit.source: Sets the network port of the ATA Center Service
trans-unit.target: Sets the network port of the ATA Center Service

trans-unit.source: Sets the certificate thumbprint for the ATA Center Service.
trans-unit.target: Sets the certificate thumbprint for the ATA Center Service.

trans-unit.source: This Certificate is used to secure communication between the ATA Center and the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: This Certificate is used to secure communication between the ATA Center and the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: If not set, the installation will generate a self-signed certificate.
trans-unit.target: If not set, the installation will generate a self-signed certificate.

trans-unit.source: Sets the IP address of the ATA Console
trans-unit.target: Sets the IP address of the ATA Console

trans-unit.source: Specifies the certificate thumbprint for the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the certificate thumbprint for the ATA Console.

trans-unit.source: This Certificate is used to validate the identity of the ATA Console website.If not specified, the installation will generate a self-signed certificate
trans-unit.target: This Certificate is used to validate the identity of the ATA Console website.If not specified, the installation will generate a self-signed certificate

trans-unit.target: Must be set to enforce the silent installation of .Net Framework.

trans-unit.source: When updating ATA, the installer automatically detects that ATA is already installed on the server, and no update installation option is required.
trans-unit.target: When updating ATA, the installer automatically detects that ATA is already installed on the server, and no update installation option is required.

trans-unit.source: In large environments, the ATA Center update can take a while to complete.
trans-unit.target: In large environments, the ATA Center update can take a while to complete.

trans-unit.source: Monitor ATA logs to track the progress of the update.
trans-unit.target: Monitor ATA logs to track the progress of the update.

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the user account (user@domain.com) that is used to register the ATA Gateway with the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: Sets the name of the user account (user@domain.com) that is used to register the ATA Gateway with the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Sets the password for the user account (user@domain.com) that is used to register the ATA Gateway with the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: Sets the password for the user account (user@domain.com) that is used to register the ATA Gateway with the ATA Center.
